is.iclt.icenlp.core.icetagger
Class IceHeuristics

java.lang.Object
  is.iclt.icenlp.core.icetagger.IceHeuristics

public class IceHeuristics
extends java.lang.Object

Heuristic methods for tagging Icelandic text.
Based on the paper:
Hrafn Loftsson. Tagging a morphologically complex language using heuristics. In T. Salakoski, F. Ginter, S. Pyysalo and T. Pahikkala (eds.), Advances in Natural Language Processing, 5th International Conference on NLP, FinTAL 2006, Proceedings. Turku, Finland.

Author:
Hrafn Loftsson

getSubjectPreviousPhrase

private int getSubjectPreviousPhrase(int verbIndex,
                                     IceTokenTags.SVOMark subjType)
Tries to find a subject from the previuos phrase. Returns the index found, else -1. Just look 10 tokens to the left.

Parameters:
verbIndex - The index of the verb
subjType - The type of the subject
Returns:
The index found

                     IceTokenTags tokenToCheck,
                     IceTokenTags tokenToMatch)
Performs agreement match between two tokens

Parameters:
type - The type of agreement
tokenToCheck - The token whose tags will possibly be removed
tokenToMatch - The token for which tokenToCheck will be matched against
Returns:
true if a match exists
